file_content.text: The leading cause of the spread of rakghoul infection is apathy. Be informed, look for telltale signs of infection, and stay alert.
Be advised: anyone exhibiting signs of genetic mutation from rakghoul-plague exposure should be seen as an imminent threat.
To prevent further spread of the rakghoul plague, the use of lethal force on mutated individuals is strongly advised.
There is no cure for the rakghoul plague. It is important to stress that sufferers of rakghoul mutation cannot be saved.
The Supreme Chancellor strongly urges extreme caution during the present rakghoul threat. Please heed all THORN safety precaution guidelines.
Warning: the Interstellar Travel Council has issued a Level One Emergency Alert on Tatooine due to an outbreak of the rakghoul plague.
Do not attempt to evacuate loved ones from Tatooine. Full rakghoul quarantine protocols are presently in effect.
The Hyland Organization for Rakghoul Neutralization seeks qualified aid volunteers on Tatooine. Locate a THORN representative onworld for details.
In uncertain times, safety remains the Republic's top priority. Therefore, solutions of all severities remain subject to consideration in ending the rakghoul problem on Tatooine.
Shipments originating from Anchorhead and other spaceports of Tatooine will be turned away while the rakghoul alert remains in effect.
Warning: the Interstellar Travel Council has issued a Level One Emergency Alert on Alderaan due to an outbreak of the rakghoul plague.
Do not attempt to evacuate loved ones from Alderaan. Full rakghoul quarantine protocols are presently in effect.
The Hyland Organization for Rakghoul Neutralization seeks qualified aid volunteers on Alderaan. Locate a THORN representative onworld for details.
In uncertain times, safety remains the Republic's top priority. Therefore, solutions of all severities remain subject to consideration in ending the rakghoul problem on Alderaan.
Visiting dignitaries from House Organa: please see your Republic attache for extended accommodations while the rakghoul alert remains in effect on Alderaan.
Warning: the Interstellar Travel Council has issued a Level One Emergency Alert on Quesh due to an outbreak of the rakghoul plague.
Do not attempt to evacuate loved ones from Quesh. Full rakghoul quarantine protocols are presently in effect.
The Hyland Organization for Rakghoul Neutralization seeks qualified aid volunteers on Quesh. Locate a THORN representative onworld for details.
In uncertain times, safety remains the Republic's top priority. Therefore, solutions of all severities remain subject to consideration in ending the rakghoul problem on Quesh.
Though chemical-mine operations continue on Quesh, the planet remains in quarantine due to the rakghoul outbreak.
Warning: the Interstellar Travel Council has issued a Level One Emergency Alert on Corellia due to an outbreak of the rakghoul plague.
Do not attempt to evacuate loved ones from Corellia. Full rakghoul quarantine protocols are presently in effect.
The Hyland Organization for Rakghoul Neutralization seeks qualified aid volunteers on Corellia. Locate a THORN representative onworld for details.
In uncertain times, safety remains the Republic's top priority. Therefore, solutions of all severities remain subject to consideration in ending the rakghoul problem on Corellia.
Reports indicate that the rakghoul outbreak has not lessened Imperial presence on Corellia.
